ValidationRule.description: This rule is used to restrict the users other than ME Team members from changing the Country Corridor after the client is active.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISCHANGED( Country_Corridor__c ), ISCHANGED( Corridor__c ) ),
ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ),"Active"), NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Markets Ecosystems") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Country Corridor/Corridor on Active Client.
